overview: Devin is the CEO and Co-Founder at Metricly, a company that provides aggregated dashboards for startups and small businesses. Prior to that, he was the COO at 8020 Media (publishers of JPG Magazine), where he was responsible for sales, business development, finances and general operations for the online and print media company. His past startup experience includes product management and business development at BitTorrent, marketing analysis at Grand Central Communications, and running product management at Zero G Software (acquired by Macrovision). Devin has an M.B.A. from UC Berkeley’s Haas School of Business, and a B.S. in Industrial Engineering from Stanford University.
